Detailed Description

Contains the items to display the library component hierarchy to user.

int HierarchyModel::referenceCount ( const VLNV &  vlnv  )  const

Count how many times the given component is instantiated in the library.

This function does not check if the same owner is counted multiple times if same sub-component is instantiated in several components. If count that contains only unique owners then you should use getOwners().

Parameters:
vlnv Identifies the component that's instances are searched.
Returns:
Number of found instances.

Definition at line 408 of file hierarchymodel.cpp.

References rootItem_.

int HierarchyModel::getOwners ( QList< VLNV > &  list,
const VLNV &  vlnvToSearch 
) const [virtual]

Get the components that have instantiated the given vlnv in their design.

This function makes sure each owner is appended to the list only once.

Parameters:
list QList where the search results are appended.
vlnvToSearch Identifies the component to search for.
Returns:
Number of owners found.

void HierarchyModel::onComponentSaved ( const VLNV &  vlnv  )  [slot]

This function should be called when a component has changed.

Function updates the hierarchical model so that changes made to the component are visible.

Parameters:
vlnv Identifies the component that was saved.
